content.rekoportal: Web application of a social portal for historical reenactors.
content.rekoportal-m: Android application of a social network for historical reenactors.
content.goodwire: Air quality monitoring system, equipped with mobile measuring devices.
content.gojump: A mobile arcade game for Android devices.
content.ai1: Implementation of an algorithm for exploring frequently used element sets and learning association rules.
content.ai2: Implementation of the algorithm that makes decisions based on the processed input data.
content.ai3: Implementation of an algorithm used for random variable value prediction and classification.
content.pearpair: Angular dating site with API written in ASP.NET Core.
content.poke: A Windows game based on the classic Space Invaders game.
content.astar: Implementing the shortest path finding heuristic algorithm.

skills.title: My skills
text: I have been interested in the IT industry and technology for a long time. Mainly involved in creating Fronend applications.
I also have skills in creating Backend applications and programming microcontrollers and PLCs.

subtitle1: What is my job and interests?
content: I was interested in computer science and programming since I was a child
starting from an IT club in primary school and attending an IT technical school
in which I took my first steps in programming. The next stage of my education was studying Computer Science
which I started in 2015, then I also dealt with more, professional programming. I'm young
a creative and inquisitive person in a good sense. Apart from computer science, I also graduated from mechatronics studies. I like solving puzzles and puzzles
as a beginner programmer I am interested in issues related to programming and technology.
about.link-ct: More about my interests can be found further down this page. Click or scroll further
about.hobby1: Apart from my interests in IT and technology, I am also interested in history. Since 2014 I am an active member of the historical reconstruction group
hobby2: In my free time I also like to watch a good movie or series. The most frequently chosen genres of cinema are: action movies, horror movies
Science fiction and documentaries. Besides, if the weather permits, I like to rest in the open air, including cycling trips. My hobby is also various kinds of DIY.
